attributes.action: Investigate how many reported rapes are fake
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
According to the testimony of several police chiefs almost all of the rape cases they receive from women were fabricated to gain revenge against the accused man or for attention. This high volume of fake to real rape cases also results in a seemingly very low conviction rate for rape.

The Government needs to investigate what percentage of reported rapes are fake, why people are reporting fake rapes, and what can be done to stop this.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
